FAQ / Wave 2 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Divebomb - Aerial Assault

  1. If the card isn’t an Action, does it stay revealed? [Source: WotC]
    No, although you are allowed to look at it and read it. Once you’ve done so, the card goes back to your opponent’s hand hidden.
